forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. Windy. High 13C. Winds ESE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with winds diminishing during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds ESE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
